message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. What do you say?
I'll give you a smaller share, but it's still a good deal
Not good enough, Bob. I'm not giving up 2/3 of the money!
I'll give you 40% and take 60%. It's a fair compromise, Bob.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still not giving up too much
No way, Bob! I'm not getting 30% of the money. I'll do better than that!
I'll give you 45% and take 55%. It's a fair split, Bob. Let's finalize the deal!
I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm not giving up too much more
No way, Bob! I'm not getting 10% of the money. That's not even a fair share!
I'm going back to the original 50/50 split. Let's just get this over with!
